LanguageData.BRG.logginginfo: Will show more log messages, good for debugging
LanguageData.BRG.noeffect: Has no effect if 'Put recipes in context menu' is checked
LanguageData.BRG.contextmenuinfo: Put recipes to context menu of source recipe instead of adding after it in the same list.
LanguageData.BRG.qualityitems: Generate bulk recipes for quality items
LanguageData.BRG.qualityitemsinfo: Will create recipes for items that have quality. How these are handled can be further defined below.
LanguageData.BRG.sameforallinfo: Recipes that make items that have quality will use the same quality for all created items. Inspiration will apply to all items created.
LanguageData.BRG.removerecipes: Remove modded recipes from save ({0} found)
